add-person-location-validation-error.programs-required: At least one program is required.

not-found.apology: We're sorry you ended up here. Sometimes a page gets moved or deleted, but hopefully we can help you find what you're looking for. What next?
not-found.page-tag: We couldn't find that web page

home.message: Single client view is an aggregated, consistent, and holistic representation of the data held by the Government of Canada about its users that can be viewed in one centralized location.

provide-person-identification.title: Provide the identification of the person

description.content: This screen shows you the different demographic and personal information that participating programs hold about you, as well as the contact information you have provided to the participating programs. Please note that it is possible for the personal information to be different across programs depending on how and when that data was created. If you notice any errors, please let us know! From this screen you can add new contact information and decide which programs you want to access and use that contact information. Once you add new data, you can request updates to the various programs. Once they accept or reject your data, we will let you know.

add.title: Add an address
add.search-placeholder: Type the address as a single line (for example, 1-19 Spadina Ave)

validation-error.program-one-must-be-selected: You must select at least one program!

description.content: This screen allows you to adjust your preferences for the channels we use to contact you, how frequently, and allows you to fine-tune those settings for different programs because your communication needs may be different from program to program. In addition, this screen allows you to identify inclusivity characteristics for the purposes of locating customized benefits and services. And finally, you can specify accessibility needs that will change how we communicate to you and make sure any correspondence we send you is in the right format.

description.content-top: This screen allows you to see what data is held about you in the participating programs, and how that data is being used under legislative authority. This view also allows you to adjust controls for how your data is used in the following contexts:
context-items: Re-use of general profile data to facilitate upcoming or new administrative requirements like filling applications and providing updates once for multiple programs
Allowing the view of service preference data to customize benefit and service identification specific to your needs
Allowing service agents to view your service preference data so that they can customize the service experience to meet your needs
Allowing use of your general profile data for eligibility determination for benefits and services
description.content-bottom: Consent is usually provided as a single transaction – you are allowing us to take your instruction once and apply it to an administrative or service need. As such, we will often re-confirm your consent to ensure you still want us to use the data the same way. Some consents will be persistent until you tell us to change the activity, such as finding benefits and services through a regular automated web search where we provide you compiled results. You are free to adjust your consent over time using this view.

description.content: This screen allows you to set automated searches to compile job searches, skills development, educational opportunities and career exploration. Once you tell us where you want us to look for this information and how often you would like us to repeat searches, we will provide the compilation of results underneath each tab in this view screen.

terms-and-conditions.document-title: My Service Canada Account - Create Single Client View
terms-and-conditions.page-title: My Service Canada Account - Create Single Client View

content.list-of-programs-participate: Currently, the following list of programs participate in the Single client View integrated service profile:
content.clicking-below: By clicking below, you are providing your consent for us to search the participating programs and generate the general profile information that those programs hold about you for you to see. After that, you can manage how your data is updated and shared across programs from the Single Client View!
content.further-consent-provision: Further consent provision can also allow you to:
further-consent-provision-items: Use general profile data for pre-filling applications
Make your preferences viewable by service agents during service phone calls or in-person
Using your general profile data to filter relevant job searches, or other benefits and services

content.read-and-agree: I have read and agree to the privacy and terms and conditions

wordmark.description: Symbol of the Government of Canada

login.greeting: Enter your details to log in to your account.
login.bad-credentials: The username and password you entered did not match our records. Please double-check and try again.
